catalog.description: Studio course which familiarizes the student with the history, terminology, elements, and principles of effective typographic communication.
catalog.note: NOTE: Fall semester: Available to majors only until August 31, when the course will open to minors. Open for Advertising Design minors on June 30. NOTE: Winter semester: Available to majors only, and students assigned pre-BFA graphic design status. Open for Advertising Design minors on November 1.
catalog.prerequisite: DESGD 145; or DESIL 101. Accepted Graphic Design pre-majors, Illustration BFA majors, Advertising Design minors, or instructor's consent.
catalog.title: Typography 1.

course_headers.header_text: DESGD 243 is available to majors only, until August 31<sup>st</sup>. On August 31<sup>st</sup> the course will open to minors. The course will open for Advertising Design minors on June 30<sup>th</sup>.
